com.lef.scanner

类 IBeaconManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lef.scanner.IBeaconManager

  • public class IBeaconManager
extends java.lang.Object
    An class used to set up interaction with iBeacons from an Activity or Service. This class is used in conjunction with IBeaconConsumer interface, which provides a callback when the IBeaconService is ready to use. Until this callback is made, ranging and monitoring of iBeacons is not possible.
    版本:
    1.0

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static boolean debug
      调试指示 set to true if you want to see debug messages associated with this library
      static long DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_BETWEEN_SCAN_PERIOD
      默认后台扫描周期间隔
      The default duration in milliseconds spent not scanning between each bluetooth scan cycle when no ranging/monitoring clients are in the foreground
      static long DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_SCAN_PERIOD
      默认后台扫描周期
      The default duration in milliseconds of the bluetooth scan cycle when no ranging/monitoring clients are in the foreground
      static long DEFAULT_FOREGROUND_BETWEEN_SCAN_PERIOD
      默认扫描周期之间的间隔
      The default duration in milliseconds spent not scanning between each bluetooth scan cycle
      static long DEFAULT_FOREGROUND_SCAN_PERIOD
      默认蓝牙扫描周期
      The default duration in milliseconds of the bluetooth scan cycle
      static long DEFAULT_INSIDE_EXPIRATION_MILLIS
      默认存活时间

      设置蓝牙扫描模式为前台或后台，后台模式比较省电
      This method notifies the iBeacon service that the IBeaconConsumer is either moving to background mode or foreground mode When in background mode, BluetoothLE scans to look for iBeacons are executed less frequently in order to save battery life The specific scan rates for background and foreground operation are set by the defaults below, but may be customized.

      Tells the IBeaconService to stop looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setDebug

        public static void setDebug(boolean debug)

      • setForegroundScanPeriod

        public void setForegroundScanPeriod(long p)
        设置前台扫描时间
        Sets the duration in milliseconds of each Bluetooth LE scan cycle to look for iBeacons. This function is used to setup the period before calling bind(com.lef.scanner.IBeaconConsumer) or when switching between background/foreground. To have it effect on an already running scan (when the next cycle starts), call updateScanPeriods()
        参数:
        p -

      • setForegroundBetweenScanPeriod

        public void setForegroundBetweenScanPeriod(long p)
        Sets the duration in milliseconds between each Bluetooth LE scan cycle to look for iBeacons. This function is used to setup the period before calling bind(com.lef.scanner.IBeaconConsumer) or when switching between background/foreground. To have it effect on an already running scan (when the next cycle starts), call updateScanPeriods()
        参数:
        p -

      • setBackgroundScanPeriod

        public void setBackgroundScanPeriod(long p)
        Sets the duration in milliseconds of each Bluetooth LE scan cycle to look for iBeacons. This function is used to setup the period before calling bind(com.lef.scanner.IBeaconConsumer) or when switching between background/foreground. To have it effect on an already running scan (when the next cycle starts), call updateScanPeriods()
        参数:
        p -

      • checkAvailability

        public boolean checkAvailability()
        判断是否是安卓4.3以上，判断是否有低功耗蓝牙，判断蓝牙是否启动 全部正常返回true
        Check if Bluetooth LE is supported by this Android device, and if so, make sure it is enabled. Throws a BleNotAvailableException if Bluetooth LE is not supported. (Note: The Android emulator will do this)
        返回:
        false if it is supported and not enabled

      • bind

        public void bind(IBeaconConsumer consumer)
        绑定到服务或者Activity Binds an Android Activity or Service to the IBeaconService. The Activity or Service must implement the IBeaconConsuemr interface so that it can get a callback when the service is ready to use.
        参数:
        consumer - the Activity or Service that will receive the callback when the service is ready.

      • unBind

        public void unBind(IBeaconConsumer consumer)
        解绑定
        Unbinds an Android Activity or Service to the IBeaconService. This should typically be called in the onDestroy() method.
        参数:
        consumer - the Activity or Service that no longer needs to use the service.

      • isBound

        public boolean isBound(IBeaconConsumer consumer)
        判断是否应用是否绑定服务
        Tells you if the passed iBeacon consumer is bound to the service
        参数:
        consumer -
        返回:

      • setBackgroundMode

        public boolean setBackgroundMode(IBeaconConsumer consumer,
                        boolean backgroundMode)
        设置蓝牙扫描模式为前台或后台，后台模式比较省电
        This method notifies the iBeacon service that the IBeaconConsumer is either moving to background mode or foreground mode When in background mode, BluetoothLE scans to look for iBeacons are executed less frequently in order to save battery life The specific scan rates for background and foreground operation are set by the defaults below, but may be customized. Note that when multiple IBeaconConsumers exist, all must be in background mode for the the background scan periods to be used When ranging in the background, the time between updates will be much less fequent than in the foreground. Updates will come every time interval equal to the sum total of the BackgroundScanPeriod and the BackgroundBetweenScanPeriod All IBeaconConsumers are by default treated as being in foreground mode unless this method is explicitly called indicating otherwise.
        参数:
        consumer -
        backgroundMode - true indicates the iBeaconConsumer is in the background returns true if background mode is successfully set
        另请参阅:
        DEFAULT_FOREGROUND_SCAN_PERIOD, #DEFAULT_FOREGROUND_BETWEEN_SCAN_PERIOD;, #DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_SCAN_PERIOD;, #DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_BETWEEN_SCAN_PERIOD;, setForegroundScanPeriod(long p), setForegroundBetweenScanPeriod(long p), setBackgroundScanPeriod(long p), setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod(long p)

      • setRangeNotifier

        public void setRangeNotifier(RangeNotifier notifier)
        设置扫描通知，即回调通知读取到的beaconRangeNotifier
        Specifies a class that should be called each time the IBeaconService gets ranging data, which is nominally once per second when iBeacons are detected. IMPORTANT: Only one RangeNotifier may be active for a given application. If two different activities or services set different RangeNotifier instances, the last one set will receive all the notifications.
        参数:
        notifier - 需要开发者自己实现，SDK启动后将回调
        另请参阅:
        RangeNotifier

      • setMonitorNotifier

        public void setMonitorNotifier(MonitorNotifier notifier)
        Specifies a class that should be called each time the IBeaconService gets sees or stops seeing a Region of iBeacons. IMPORTANT: Only one MonitorNotifier may be active for a given application. If two different activities or services set different RangeNotifier instances, the last one set will receive all the notifications.
        参数:
        notifier -
        另请参阅:
        MonitorNotifier, startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region), Region

      • startRangingBeaconsInRegion

        public void startRangingBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
                                 throws RemoteException
        启动扫描定义的一个region 的beacon，扫描到的beacon将更加定义的region过滤
        Tells the IBeaconService to start looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object, and providing updates on the estimated distance very seconds while iBeacons in the Region are visible. Note that the Region's unique identifier must be retained to later call the stopRangingBeaconsInRegion method.
        参数:
        region -
        抛出:
        RemoteException
        另请参阅:
        setRangeNotifier(RangeNotifier), stopRangingBeaconsInRegion(Region region), RangeNotifier, Region

      • stopRangingBeaconsInRegion

        public void stopRangingBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
                                throws RemoteException
        停止某个区域的通知
        Tells the IBeaconService to stop looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object and providing distance information for them.
        参数:
        region -
        抛出:
        RemoteException
        另请参阅:
        setMonitorNotifier(MonitorNotifier notifier), startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region), MonitorNotifier, Region

      • startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion

        public void startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
                                    throws RemoteException
        启动监测是否进入某个定义的region
        Tells the IBeaconService to start looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object. Note that the Region's unique identifier must be retained to later call the stopMonitoringBeaconsInRegion method.
        参数:
        region -
        抛出:
        RemoteException
        另请参阅:
        setMonitorNotifier(MonitorNotifier), stopMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region), MonitorNotifier, Region

      • stopMonitoringBeaconsInRegion

        public void stopMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region)
                                   throws RemoteException
        停止监测
        Tells the IBeaconService to stop looking for iBeacons that match the passed Region object. Note that the Region's unique identifier is used to match it to and existing monitored Region.
        参数:
        region -
        抛出:
        RemoteException
        另请参阅:
        setMonitorNotifier(MonitorNotifier), startMonitoringBeaconsInRegion(Region region), MonitorNotifier, Region

      • updateScanPeriods

        public void updateScanPeriods()
                       throws RemoteException
        更新扫描时间设置
        Updates an already running scan with scanPeriod/betweenScanPeriod according to Background/Foreground state. Change will take effect on the start of the next scan cycle.
        抛出:
        RemoteException - - If the IBeaconManager is not bound to the service.
